items.text: In completing the information in this checklist, you are creating a document to which you can refer in the future. Please fill out each section completely and accurately. In the future this form will be available throughout the year so that you can document your contributions to the departmental mission more contemporaneously. Please check off any items that apply to your involvement throughout the past academic year. The checklist consists of multiple pages, each page containing related subsections. Some checklist items may have follow-up questions, please complete them to the best of your ability. Some items may allow you to specify a list of items, you can add an item using the Add item button below the list, or remove an entry using the Remove item button to the left of the list item. Lists must have at least one item to be considered valid. Any incomplete required questions will be marked using yellow text. All items on the page must be valid before you continue to the next one or submit the form, so if it won't let you continue please look for yellow warning text. At any point you can save your current progress using the blue button to the bottom of the form, and you will be able to continue from where you left off. To navigate through the pages of the checklist, please use the Next page and Back buttons on the top and bottom of the form. On the final page, the next button will be replaced by a Submit button, which you can use to submit the form once you're finished. If you encounter any technical issues or have questions about the checklist itself, please let Jacob Mischka know at [jmischka@mcw.edu](mailto:jmischka@mcw.edu) and he'll get to it right away. Thank you!
Medical Student Advisor - Counsel > 3 sessions, write letter of recommendation
Coordinator of Morning Lecture Series / Visiting Professor
**New** lecture for residents - mock exams, Journal Club, similar (4-5 hours to make quality 30 min. lecture)
Creation of a new course for residents / fellows
